0: It’s a disturbing “game” that’s terrorizing residents in some Brooklyn communities. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR “Knockout,” where a random person is targeted and sucker-punched for no reason other than to knock them unconscious, is a growing trend among bored, clearly misguided, teens. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR After a string of attacks in predominately Jewish neighborhoods in Brooklyn, the NYPD is investigating the incidences as possible hate crimes. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR The most recent attack was caught on surveillance video this past Tuesday in Crown Heights. Ten men spotted a man walking alone, punched him and kept on moving.
